CompareFaces.name: CompareFaces
CompareFaces.description:
Compares a face in source input image with each face detected in the target input
                                                image.

CreateCollection.name: CreateCollection
CreateCollection.description:
Creates a collection in an AWS region. You can then add faces to the collection using
                                                the IndexFaces API.

CreateProject.name: CreateProject
CreateProject.description: Creates a new Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels project.

CreateProjectVersion.name: CreateProjectVersion
CreateProjectVersion.description: Creates a new version of a model and begins training.

CreateStreamProcessor.name: CreateStreamProcessor
CreateStreamProcessor.description:
Creates an Amazon Rekognition stream processor that you can use to detect and recognize
                                                faces in a streaming video.

DeleteCollection.name: DeleteCollection
DeleteCollection.description:
Deletes the specified collection. Note that this operation removes all faces in the
                                                collection.

DeleteStreamProcessor.name: DeleteStreamProcessor
DeleteStreamProcessor.description: Deletes the stream processor identified by Name.

DescribeProjectVersions.name: DescribeProjectVersions
DescribeProjectVersions.description: Lists and describes the model versions in an Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels project.

DescribeProjects.name: DescribeProjects
DescribeProjects.description: Lists and gets information about your Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels projects.

DescribeStreamProcessor.name: DescribeStreamProcessor
DescribeStreamProcessor.description: Provides information about a stream processor created by CreateStreamProcessor.

DetectCustomLabels.name: DetectCustomLabels
DetectCustomLabels.description:
Detects custom labels in a supplied image by using an Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels
                                                model version.

DetectFaces.name: DetectFaces
DetectFaces.description: Detects human faces within an image (JPEG or PNG) provided as input.

DetectLabels.name: DetectLabels
DetectLabels.description: Detects instances of real-world labels within an image (JPEG or PNG) provided as input.

DetectModerationLabels.name: DetectModerationLabels
DetectModerationLabels.description: Detects moderation labels within input image.

DetectProtectiveEquipment.name: DetectProtectiveEquipment
DetectProtectiveEquipment.description: Detects Protective Equipment in the input image.

DetectText.name: DetectText
DetectText.description: Detects text in the input image and converts it into machine-readable text.

GetCelebrityInfo.name: GetCelebrityInfo
GetCelebrityInfo.description:
Gets the name and additional information about a celebrity based on his or her Rekognition
                                                ID.

GetCelebrityRecognition.name: GetCelebrityRecognition
GetCelebrityRecognition.description:
Gets the celebrity recognition results for a Rekognition Video analysis started by
                                                StartCelebrityRecognition.

GetContentModeration.name: GetContentModeration
GetContentModeration.description:
Gets the content moderation analysis results for a Rekognition Video analysis started
                                                by StartContentModeration.

GetFaceDetection.name: GetFaceDetection
GetFaceDetection.description: Gets face detection results for a Rekognition Video analysis started by StartFaceDetection.

GetFaceSearch.name: GetFaceSearch
GetFaceSearch.description: Gets the face search results for Rekognition Video face search started by StartFaceSearch.

GetLabelDetection.name: GetLabelDetection
GetLabelDetection.description: Gets the label detection results of a Rekognition Video analysis started by StartLabelDetection.

GetPersonTracking.name: GetPersonTracking
GetPersonTracking.description: Gets information about people detected within a video.

GetSegmentDetection.name: GetSegmentDetection
GetSegmentDetection.description: Gets segment detection results for a Rekognition Video analysis started by StartSegmentDetection.

GetTextDetection.name: GetTextDetection
GetTextDetection.description: Gets text detection results for a Rekognition Video analysis started by StartTextDetection.

IndexFaces.name: IndexFaces
IndexFaces.description: Detects faces in the input image and adds them to the specified collection.

ListCollections.name: ListCollections
ListCollections.description: Returns a list of collection IDs in your account.

ListFaces.name: ListFaces
ListFaces.description: Returns metadata for faces in the specified collection.

ListStreamProcessors.name: ListStreamProcessors
ListStreamProcessors.description: Gets a list of stream processors that you have created with CreateStreamProcessor.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Returns a list of tags associated with a resource.

RecognizeCelebrities.name: RecognizeCelebrities
RecognizeCelebrities.description: Returns an array of celebrities recognized in the input image.

SearchFaces.name: SearchFaces
SearchFaces.description: For a given input face ID, searches the specified collection for matching faces.

SearchFacesByImage.name: SearchFacesByImage
SearchFacesByImage.description:
For a given input image, first detects the largest face in the image, and then searches
                                                the specified collection for matching faces.

StartCelebrityRecognition.name: StartCelebrityRecognition
StartCelebrityRecognition.description: Starts asynchronous recognition of celebrities in a video.

StartContentModeration.name: StartContentModeration
StartContentModeration.description: Starts asynchronous detection of explicit or suggestive adult content in a video.

StartFaceDetection.name: StartFaceDetection
StartFaceDetection.description: Starts asynchronous detection of faces in a video.

StartFaceSearch.name: StartFaceSearch
StartFaceSearch.description:
Starts the asynchronous search for faces in a collection that match the faces of persons
                                                detected in a video.

StartLabelDetection.name: StartLabelDetection
StartLabelDetection.description: Starts asynchronous detection of labels in a video.

StartPersonTracking.name: StartPersonTracking
StartPersonTracking.description: Starts the asynchronous tracking of persons in a video.

StartProjectVersion.name: StartProjectVersion
StartProjectVersion.description: Starts the deployment of a model version.

StartSegmentDetection.name: StartSegmentDetection
StartSegmentDetection.description: Starts asynchronous detection of segments in a video.

StartTextDetection.name: StartTextDetection
StartTextDetection.description: Starts asynchronous detection of text in a video.

StopStreamProcessor.name: StopStreamProcessor
StopStreamProcessor.description: Stops a running stream processor that was created by CreateStreamProcessor.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Adds one or more tags to a resource.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Removes one or more tags from a resource.
